typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as string,
		Title as string,
		genresgenregenre as string,
		YEAR as string,
		Rating as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(id = 22,
		name = 'blah blah') ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		id as integer,
		name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	preSQLs:['set IDENTITY_INSERT junk ON'],
	postSQLs:['set IDENTITY_INSERT junk OFF'],
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name
	)) ~> sink1
